DOC.brief_summary: It report low-dose aspirin Heparin would lead increased Pregnancy rate patient undergo IVF-ET . Low-dose aspirin may improve uterine ovarian perfusion aspirin might enhance endometrial receptivity ovarian responsiveness well , could result good implantation pregnancy rate IVF ICSI treatment . This study assess potential effect low-dose aspirin ( 100 mg daily ) pregnancy rate follow frozen embryo transfer .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Low Dose Aspirin Increasing Chance Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: In present randomize double-blind prospective study , patient randomly assign study control group . With onset endometrial preparation estrogen treatment , study group receive 100 mg oral aspirin control group give placebo . When endometrial thickness find 8-14 mm , therapy progesterone ( 100 mg IM daily ) start embryo transfer perform 48 72 hour later . Doppler ultrasonography also do calculate Resistive Index ( RI ) Pulsatility Index ( PI ) , day progesterone administration . Î²HCG assessed 14 day ET . If pregnancy achieve , patient study control group instruct continue aspirin placebo 5 week pregnancy test result negative , treatment aspirin placebo stop . The patient follow 20 week gestation result treatment cycle compare two group .
DOC.criteria: Patients `` long antagonist '' protocol Women achieve pregnancy follow fresh embryo transfer woman embryos transfer due OHSS The woman freeze embryo available another transfer contraindication aspirin The patient history recurrent abortion
DOC.keyword: low dose aspirin endometrial thickness pregnancy rate ICSI IVF embryo transfer
